mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO user_tbl ( idx, mId, mName, department_id, department_name, team_id, team_name, job_code, job_name, job_spot, job_detail, job_rank, email, uLevel ) VALUES
${item.idx}, '${item.mId}', '${item.mName}', '${item.department_id}', '${item.department_name}', '${item.team_id}', '${item.team_name}', '${item.job_code}', '${item.job_name}', '${item.job_spot}', '${item.job_detail}', '${item.job_rank}', '${item.email}', '${item.uLevel}'
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mName = mName, department_id = department_id
